bibl.title: Prayer from Alexander to Constantine. A Critical Anthology.
bibl.note: Recueil de textes, traduits et annotés. Voir en part. pp. 181-184: Robert F. HULL, Jun., 30. A Prayer to Sarapis in P. Oxy. 1070 [P. Oxy. VII, 1070]; - 195-199: Christopher A. FARAONE, 33. Hymn to Selene-Hecate-Artemis from a Greek Magical Handbook (PGM IV 2714-83) [P.G.M. IV].
bibl.seg: KILEY Mark et alii (Edited and Introduced by), Prayer from Alexander to Constantine. A Critical Anthology.
London - New York, Routledge, 1997, xx-332 pp. ISBN 0-415-13234-7 (hbk) / 0-415-13235-5 (pbk). £50 (hbk) / 15.99 (pbk).
